{"id":978982304,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"4 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1687664247,"status":15,"status_display":"Runtime Error","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/978982304/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Ways to Split Array Into Good Subarrays","memory":"N/A","code":"#include <bits/stdc++.h>\nclass Solution {\npublic:\nint mod = 1e9+7;\n    int numberOfGoodSubarraySplits(vector<int>& nums) {\n        int n = nums.size();\n        int ans = 1;\n        vector<int> t;\n        for(int i = 0;i<n;i++){\n            if(nums[i]==1) t.push_back(i); \n        }\n        if(t.size()==1) return 1;\n        if(t.size()==0)return 0;\n        for(int i = 0;i<t.size()-1;i++){\n          \n            int diff = t[i+1]-t[i];\n            ans = ans%mod;\n            ans = (ans*diff)%mod;\n        }\n        return ans%mod;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"ways-to-split-array-into-good-subarrays","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
